name: Tevris
description:
Classic tetromino game in VR.

One of the most awaited puzzle classics to be played with motion controls.
Cute blocks, vivid colors, high scores, MEGA-mode and more to come.

Features:

  • Motion gestures controls
  • Keyboard support (for hardcore players or party coop game)
  • Classic mechanics
  • Nice minimalistic graphics
  • Highscores and leaderboard
  • Extra modes
